entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers this evening. Showers beginning late this evening. Wind south 20 km/h becoming north 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 90 after midnight. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early in the morning. Clearing in the morning. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 90 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High 15. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Wednesday 26 April 2023
